forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated rain showers before 2am, then patchy fog and isolated rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. North wind around 2 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Patchy Fog then Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and isolated rain showers before 2pm, then scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 54, with temperatures rising to around 56 overnight. Northwest wind 1 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 77. West wind around 5 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
